import React, { Component } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "../css/gamify.css" class Dashboard extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { feelings: [], boosts: [], activities: [], feeling: "", boost: "", activity: "", playing: false, paused: false, frequency: "", id: "", frequencies: [], isfeelingOpen: false, isBoostOpen: false, isActivityOpen: false, } } render() { /* isPlalyable */ const playable = ((this.state.feeling !== "") && (this.state.boost !== "") && (this.state.activity !== "")) /* Disable/enable play button based on isPlayable */ let player; if (playable) { if (this.state.playing) { player = } else { player = } } else { player = } return (
